summary:
##  Performance, Cancellation & Layout Refinements

###  Essentials & Maintenance
- Widened Essentials task tiles (380–520) so status chips don’t get cramped
- Package inventory refresh now runs **off the UI thread**, keeping Maintenance responsive

###  PathPilot Responsiveness
- Inventory refresh now uses **linked cancellation + timeouts** and is cancelled on navigation
- Refresh and switch operations run on background tasks with UI updates marshaled safely
- Centralized cancellation management ensures in-flight work stops cleanly
- Navigating away from PathPilot now cancels all active operations

###  Deep Scan UX
- Prominent **top search bar** with inline mode/case/hidden/system/folder filters
- Remaining filters grouped below; options card now focuses on force-delete

###  Cleanup Setup UX
- Setup cards now use an **adaptive grid** for consistent spacing
- “Top items” card redesigned:
  - Clear header + right-aligned cap pill
  - Wider slider with min/max labels
  - Presets in a tidy grid
  - No text overlap; cleaner stacking
  - Evenly spaced slider labels

###  Navigation Cache
- Added **LRU page cache cap (4 pages)** so old pages dispose cleanly during rapid navigation
